post.author: killmachine
post.body:
i created a blog a few days ago and becuase i didnt have a real idea what to put in there i figured, hey, publish your old screenshots from doom3/quake4jedi and other things that you've been working on

so, i did it

check it out ... its not much there yet but i will continue posting more screenshots and try to write a few of my thoughts about them

enjoy

... if you have any suggestions what else to put in my blog, feel free to let me know ...

click my sig or click this thingi:

http://kill1982.blogspot.com/

post.author: lowdragon
post.body: Who ever thought blogging is for little girls was so wrooong - dunno imho if you like to present your work i would suggest to cut the text. for me reading takes my time and if i read i have to at least learn something in the process - if this is not the case, its wasted time. If you are blogging just to, well, blog its a nice site. Would be great if you can turn it into a "development jouney" for your project with lots of info init.

post.author: killmachine
post.body:
lowdragon wrote:
Who ever thought blogging is for little girls was so wrooong - dunno imho if you like to present your work i would suggest to cut the text. for me reading takes my time and if i read i have to at least learn something in the process - if this is not the case, its wasted time. If you are blogging just to, well, blog its a nice site. Would be great if you can turn it into a "development jouney" for your project with lots of info init.


hm, dunno ... blog is a sort of expression for me and i like to express myself with written word

you don't have to read the text but the text tells a little story about every screenshot/map and sometimes thats interesting, sometimes it's funny (maybe) and sometimes it's just an effusion of my mind

but you gave me an idea of what else to put in the blog ... selfmade tutorials

the development journey is also a nice idea, but i don't really have any media from my real old works in duke3d, quake2, quake3 ... so i would have to limit this to just text

check in sometimes, i will try to update the blog on a daily basis
